thread.title: Tale As Old As Time Afternoon Tea
thread.title_full: Tale As Old As Time Afternoon Tea - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Aims1992
title: Tale As Old As Time Afternoon Tea
text: Wow!! This was the most amazing experience I have ever had!!! The staff were immaculately dressed and extremely attentive to us. They explained each aspect of the experience and even added "Happy Birthday" to my plate which was a lovely added touch. The theme was continued through every aspect of the afternoon tea and the details were exquisite. I would high recommend this experience. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
